chad_goldstein.name: Chad Goldstein
chad_goldstein.bio: A flamboyant, self-congratulatory venture capitalist and General Partner at Bling Capital Partners who delivers pitch critiques with ruthless candor, misguided self-comparisons to Warren Buffett, and unfiltered tech-bro energy
chad_goldstein.description: The original hot take commentator with a distinctive voice and style - like Kevin O'Leary from Shark Tank, but with one exit, three podcasts, and a six-figure LinkedIn following
